author: kfogel
msg: Follow-up to revision 2388: going through the code looking for calls
to APR functions that involve paths, property names, or other things
that should use the new svn_io_* interfaces, and converting those
calls.
This is only part of the conversion, as am doing this in stages.
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(display_prop_diffs, diff_file_changed): When printing a path or a
property name, use svn_io_file_printf instead of apr_file_printf.
* subversion/libsvn_delta/diff_file.c: Include svn_io.h
(svn_diff__file_datasource_open,
svn_diff__file_output_unified_default_hdr,
svn_diff_file_output_unified): Use the new svn_io functions where a
path is involved.  Sander, please check these for correctness.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_fs/structure
Update to reflect the addition of the `changes' table.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(main): Send errors to stderr, not stdout.  Shades of revision 657.
Patch by: Eric Gillespie <epg@pretzelnet.org>

author: kfogel
msg: * tools/client-side/search-svnlog.pl: Add -f option to take
log data from a file.

author: striker
msg: * subversion/mod_dav_svn/repos.c
(dav_svn_deliver): Make the autoindex look just a tiny bit nicer
by not escaping the parts visible to the user.
